name: SOULKILLER: FPS HORROR SHOOTER
description:
Survive as long as possible killing hungry #zombies !
SOULKILLER is a FPS Zombie #Shooter. Survive and kill as many zombies as possible and climb the online ranking.
Choose your strategy. Explore, Loot weapons and survive until special forces come to rescue you.
You are trapped in an industrial compaund where strange cyber experiments are in progress. Survive bro!
